answers.answer: Yes, medical services and medicines are covered for everyone diagnosed with COVID-19, including insured persons, uninsured persons, and other persons on Romanian territory.
answers.bResponse: Yes, medical services and medicines are covered for everyone diagnosed with COVID-19, including insured persons, uninsured persons, and other persons on Romanian territory. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19

answers.answer: Insured persons, uninsured persons, and other individuals within Romanian territory who have been diagnosed with COVID-19 can receive coverage for all necessary medical services and medications through the FNUASS program.
answers.bResponse: Insured persons, uninsured persons, and other individuals within Romanian territory who have been diagnosed with COVID-19 can receive coverage for all necessary medical services and medications through the FNUASS program. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19

answers.answer: Yes, the FNUASS covers all necessary medical services and medications for those diagnosed with COVID-19 within Romania regardless of whether they are insured or not, as well as any other individuals present on Romanian territory who have been diagnosed with COVID-19.
answers.bResponse: Yes, the FNUASS covers all necessary medical services and medications for those diagnosed with COVID-19 within Romania regardless of whether they are insured or not, as well as any other individuals present on Romanian territory who have been diagnosed with COVID-19. For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19

answers.answer: Remote consultations offered by family doctor or specialist doctor, evaluation center services for those without oxygen therapy, mild to moderate symptoms & 2+ risk factors, Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation service, Continuous oxygen administration device for severe respiratory insufficiency, Noninvasive ventilation for certain conditions, Physical therapy, Psychological counseling, Psychotherapy (under recommendation from doctors in cardiology and pneumology)
answers.bResponse: Remote consultations offered by family doctor or specialist doctor, evaluation center services for those without oxygen therapy, mild to moderate symptoms & 2+ risk factors, Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation service, Continuous oxygen administration device for severe respiratory insufficiency, Noninvasive ventilation for certain conditions, Physical therapy, Psychological counseling, Psychotherapy (under recommendation from doctors in cardiology and pneumology) For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19

answers.answer: Those who suffer from moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19 or those who have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2 virus can benefit from a Continuous Oxygen Administration Device. This includes patients who pass through a specific triage system for infection with the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
answers.bResponse: Those who suffer from moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19 or those who have been diagnosed with SARS-CoV-2 virus can benefit from a Continuous Oxygen Administration Device.
